content.description:
Nice moderate single pitch routes a short drive from Kimberley BC. This area has some new routes on the right wall not pictured here. There is also an updated guidebook out for the area as of Spring 2021. Check local shops and climbing gyms for availability.

Routes from L to R in picture:

Geo Time, 5.11, 6 bolts            

Lichen It, 5.8 , 9 bolts                

Unknown (project?)            

Dr. K's Delight, 5.7, gear     

Rope Gum (?), 5.7/8, 6 bolts     

No Green Bananas, 5.8, 12 bolts        

Happy Hipster, 5.9/10a, 14 bolts            

Tora Bora , 5.9, 12 bolts            

Project? or 82 trips, 5.10b, 8 bolts

Sport climbs on the right side ("B side") of the crag. Not pictured, listed from L to R:

5.10b

5.8

5.10b
